info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 5:59PM EDT until July 28 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Berkshire County in western Massachusetts... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 559 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Ashford, or 7 miles west of North Adams, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, North Adams, Adams, Williamstown, Cheshire, Florida, Hancock, Savoy, New Ashford, Berkshire, Dalton, Lanesborough, Windsor, Hairpin Turn, Greylock, Soldiers Memorial Field, North Hancock, Cheshire Harbor, Arnoldville and Braytonville. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
